Class TimeData

  • java.lang.Object
    • TimeData

  • public class TimeData
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    2018-01-01
    Author:
    CS2334. Modified by: Rafal Jabrzemski

    Date: 2018-02-01
    Project 1

    This class represents a summary of one time's data from a single Mesonet station.
